message: I'm excited to offer you this high-quality product for $10000. It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on a premium item. I'm confident you'll love it, and I'm willing to take the risk of offering it to you at this price. What do you say? Will you take it?
I'm not willing to buy it at this price without knowing its true quality. I'll pass on this opportunity.

I understand your hesitation, but I'm willing to make a compromise. I'll offer you this product at the same price of $10000, but I'll throw in an exclusive warranty that covers any defects or issues you might encounter. This way, you'll have peace of mind and a risk-free purchase. What do you think?
The warranty doesn't change the fact that I don't know the product's quality. I'm still not willing to pay $10000 for a product that might be worth $0 to me.
